alert.note: Alert for Coastal Duval; Coastal Nassau; Inland Nassau; Trout River; Western Duval (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 23 at 2:00PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Nassau and north central Duval Counties through 230 PM EDT... At 159 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm just south of Yulee, or 9 miles southwest of Fernandina Beach, moving southwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds around 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Yulee and Oceanway. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Duval; Coastal Nassau; Inland Nassau; Trout River; Western Duval
